```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
install.packages("ggplot2", repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
library(ggplot2)
```
## Cyclistic

### The Data

Here it is.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
d <- read.csv("avg-duration-by-weekday.csv")
head(d)
```

### The Graphs
```{r, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(data = d, aes(x = WEEKDAY, y = AVG_DURATION, color = is_member)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~MONTH)
```
